title: Fix typo in reviewing-a-pull-request-created-by-copilot.md
author: dasevilla
details: Fixed a grammatical error in GitHub Copilot documentation by changing "comment" to "comments" for plural consistency.
Corrected the sentence: "It will not respond to comments that were added while it was not assigned."
Documentation update only, no functional code changes.
summary:
- Fixed a grammatical error in GitHub Copilot documentation by changing "comment" to "comments" for plural consistency.
- Corrected the sentence: "It will not respond to comments that were added while it was not assigned."
- Documentation update only, no functional code changes.
